distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for perl-DBD-mysql fixes the following issues:

- Add patch to fix CVE-2016-1251 (bsc#1012546) use-after-free for repeated
  fetchrow_arrayref calls when mysql_server_prepare=1
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: There is a vulnerability of type use-after-free affecting DBD::mysql (aka DBD-mysql or the Database Interface (DBI) MySQL driver for Perl) 3.x and 4.x before 4.041 when used with mysql_server_prepare=1.
notes.title: CVE description
